Module kivakit.ui.desktop
Package com.telenav.kivakit.ui.desktop.graphics.drawing

Interface Drawable

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseDrawable, Box, Dot, Label, Line, Text
public interface Drawable
An object with a style() that can be drawn on a DrawingSurface with draw(DrawingSurface). The object has a location that can be queried with withLocation(). A copy of the object can be created with copy(). A copy at a new location can be created with withLocation(DrawingPoint) and a scaled copy with scaledBy(double) or scaledBy(Percent). Once the drawable has been drawn, its Shape can be retrieved with shape().
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
